translations: adj.炖熟的；焖熟的；用文火炖到全熟的
v.用文火炖（braise 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: I braised some beans to accompany a shoulder of lamb.
sentences.translation: 我炖了些豆子，作为羊肩肉的配菜。

sentences.sentence: Chicken liver is braised beforehand to remove its gaminess.
sentences.translation: 鸡肝事先炖过以去除其异味。
炖肉(烤鸡，烘肉卷，肉丸子)。
